titles.title: Were you there when they crucified my Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Were you there when they crucified my Lord?*2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh sometimes it causes me to tremble( tremble*2)
were you there when they crucified my Lord?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Were you there when they nailed Him on a tree?

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Were you there when they pierced Him in the side?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: were you there when the sun refuserd to shine?

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Were you there when they laid Him in the tomb?

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Were you there when He rose out from the Tomb?
